welcome_message_body: Welcome to Al Muharraq, the charming and historic city known for its traditional architecture and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy the unique charm of this beautiful city during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bahrain International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport offers a range of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Sakhir Air Base Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at King Abdulaziz AB Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at King Abdulaziz AB Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
